ref: 6831 *dhuriya -- , dhúrya -- ʻ fit to be harnessed ʼ Pāṇ., ʻ foremost ʼ AV., m. ʻ beast of burden ʼ Mn., dhurīya -- ʻ fit for a burden ʼ, m. ʻ beast of burden ʼ lex. [dhúr -- ]
Bi. dhūrī, dhuriyā ʻ the wheeler in a team of three bullocks ʼ. -- In
Bi. dhūr ʻ bullock, cattle (in general) ʼ loss of final syllable is unexpl.
